GIMP is included as the standard image editor on most general purpose [[Linux distribution]]s, including [[Debian]], [[Ubuntu (operating system)|ubuntu]], [[Mandriva]], [[SUSE Linux|SUSE]], and [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora]].
A port of GIMP to [[Microsoft Windows]] was started by Finnish programmer Tor "tml" Lillqvist in 1997. The GIMP website links to binary installers compiled by Jernej SimonÄiÄ for the platform.<ref>{{cite web | title = GIMP - Windows installers | url = http://gimp-win.sourceforge.net/ | accessdate = 2005-11-20 }}</ref>
